
=================================================================
1-SHOT
With only the questionnaire TOPIC
=================================================================

-------------------
[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100046
     - Topic: Teambuilding initiatives feedback
     - Question number: 6

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 1146002
     - Topic: Stress at work
     - Question number: 7
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Stress at work

-------------------
-------------------

[LLM ANSWER]
 **How did your current organization handle their new employee orientation process before COVID-19 pandemic started, compared with how it is now handled in the age of remote work due this crisis situation (if you are working remotely)?** 	50%|   |   83.7246/166 s
 - Yes: much better; Better face to Face interaction and more personalized training experience, but not as good with virtual sessions because it is harder for people who have never met before pandemic start working together effectively without having time or resources needed in order make them comfortable enough so that they can perform their jobs properly. 	|
 - No: worse; Not able to get all necessary information and materials required due lack of physical presence at office, making communication more difficult between colleagues because most people don't feel confident speaking up when not present physically with others even if it is just through a screen (please specify)."Please select from the following options:"
 - Yes: Much better; The new employee onboarding process has been handled much effectively before COVID-19 pandemic started compared to how they are now handling in this crisis situation of remote work. This could be because there was more face time interaction and a personalized training experience that cannot fully replicated online, creating an atmosphere where people feel less comfortable speaking up or asking questions when not physically present with others even if it is just through the screen (please specify).
 - No: Worse; The new employee onboarding process has been handled worse during COVID-19 pandemic compared to how they were handling before. This could be due lack of access all necessary information and materials required because physical presence at office, making communication more difficult between colleagues as most people don't feel confident speaking up if not physically present with others even when using technology for meetings (please specify).
 - Other: Please provide details on what you think about the new employee orientation process before COVID-19 pandemic started compared to how they are now handling in this crisis situation of remote work. Include whether it has been better or worse and why, specifying any specific challenges faced during transition from physical presence at office environment into virtual one (please specify).
 - Unsure: Please provide more information on your thoughts about the new employee orientation process before COVID-19 pandemic started compared to how they are now handling in this crisis situation of remote work. Include whether it has been better or worse and why, specifying any specific challenges faced during transition from physical presence at office environment into virtual one (please specify).

 {
"data": {

},
{

}
]
},
{
"CODE": "Q0002",
"NAME": "Do you think that the onboarding process for new employees is still effective even though most activities are taking place online? Please explain your answer.",
"TYPE\_ID": 2,
"DISPLAY\_ORDER": 2,
"_TF\_ANSWERS": [
{
"ANSWER": "Yes, but there have been some challenges and adjustments needed to make it feel as personal; the process still feels quite formal due lack of face-to-face interaction"
},
{
"ANSWER": "No, it is not effective"
},
{
"ANSWER": "It depends"
}
]
}
]
}
}

This JSON object represents a questionnaire with two questions. The first question asks whether the onboarding process for new employees is still effective when most activities are taking place online, and the second question asks whether the onboarding process is still effective in the age of remote work due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The first question allows for four possible answers, while the second question allows for three possible answers. The `DISPLAY_ORDER` property is used to order the questions, and the `TYPE_ID` property is used to specify the type of question. The `_TF_ANSWERS` array contains the possible answers to the question.

=================================================================

With only the questionnaire TOPIC
=================================================================

     - Question number: 10

 **How would you like your employees’ opinions about their work environment? Please specify.** ⏤ Yes: I want detailed information from my team members, including suggestions and constructive criticism. No : Prefer not to hear any comments or complaints regarding the workplace culture at this time! Neutral - Collecting basic feedback with no further details is okay for now; however a more specific approach may be required soon in order get valuable insights about employee satisfaction level within my company

=================================================================

-------------------
[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100054
     - Topic: WorkLife Balance
     - Question number: 7

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 1213249
     - Topic: Training effectiveness
     - Question number: 2
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Training effectiveness

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]

**How would assess a participant's learning experience with our organization as it relates to their performance after attending your sessions.** 	extends = ["Very satisfied", "Slightly Satisfied","Neutral / Can’t tell if they are positive or negative about the program and its impact, but not necessarily dissatisfated.", "<br> SLighty Dissatified <span style='color:red;'>Not a good sign</p>",  	"Very Unsatisifed"] 
**What percentage of participants who have attended your sessions can be considered to show improved performance? (Please pick one number)**    Extends = ["0%", "5-19 %","20 -34%, <br>This is a C<span style='color:red;'>D</p>", 	"67-%8, but not quite two thirds of participants have shown improvement.",

**How do you measure a participant’ training needs and learning progress? **What is your preferred method for engaging with participants during training sessions? Please select one.**    Extends = ["I prefer interactive methods such as role play, group work or simulations", "Presenting information using a slideshow presentation format.",   <br> I like to use technology and visuals in my tr<span style='color:red;'>a</p>:inings."]
**How often do you evaluate the effectiveness of your training sessions? Please select one.**    Extends = ["I regularly review how effective a session was, evaluating its strengths or weaknesses.", "Only after I have been facilitating for some time. <span style='color:red;'>Not sure why someone would not want to know</p> if they are making an impact with their sessions."]
**How do you adapt your training techniques and materials based on participant feedback? Please select one.**    Extends = ["I regularly ask participants about what could be better, then make changes.", "Very rarely. I feel that my way is the best for everyone else too",   <br> If someone gives me constructive criticism or negative<span style='color:red;'> evaluat</p>:ion of a session they attended with others present in front room -I consider making adjustments."]
**What are your thoughts on using technology to deliver training sessions? Please select one.**    Extends = ["Very supportive. I think it’s important for everyone involved and engaged, including the facilitator.", "Not as much because people seem more focused when they can see each other",   <br> Technology is a great way of engaging participants in trainingsessions.<span style='color:red;'> but not necessarily</p>:the best format."]

Please select one.**    Extends = ["I look at participant feedback, satisfaction and performance improvement", "Participant retention rates. <br> If people keep coming back to my session it’s a good sign.",   "<a href=\"https://en.wikipediaorg/wiki//1-59%20isn't<span style='color:red;'>Agoodsign</p>:"> I use participant performance as primary metric."]

[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100049
     - Topic: Training and Development Programs
     - Question number: 6

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 5100002
     - Topic: Training to professional users
     - Question number: 12
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Training to professional users

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **Do you find that current employee education, learning materials provided by your company are sufficient for performing job duties effectively in the long term (6 months)? If not which areas do they need improvement or additional resources.**  - Yes  	- No    with sections of:     o Not enough time to learn and apply new skills.     o Lack technical knowledge/skills required
**Do you feel that your company's training programs are aligned well, meaning the learning objectives meet professional needs? If not which areas need improvement or better alignment.**  - Yes  	- No    with sections of:     o Not enough specificity in courses.     o Lack advanced skills development opportunities for future growth
**Do you feel that your company's training programs are accessible and easy to understand by all employees, including those who might not be tech savvy? If no which areas need improvement or better explanation.**  - Yes  	- No    with sections of:     o Lack clear instructions.     o Not enough visual aids
**Do you feel that your company's training programs are accessible to everyone and do they include options for remote learning, including online resources? If not which areas need improvement or better accessibility.**  - Yes  	- No    with sections of:     o Lack offline materials.     o Not enough digital content

If not which areas need improvement or better efficiency.**  - Yes  	- No    with sections of:     o Lack practical examples.     o Not enough real life application
**Do you feel that your company's training programs are effective in providing a path for further education and growth within an organization, including leadership skills? If not which areas need improvement or better progression.**  - Yes  	- No    with sections of:     o Lack opportunities to advance.     o Not enough chances at higher positions
**Do you feel that your company's training programs are effective in creating a workforce capable and confident, including employees who can handle difficult situations? If not which areas need improvement or better preparedness.**  - Yes  	- No    with sections of:     o Lack confidence on the job.     o Not enough professionalism
**Do you feel that your company's training programs are effective in creating a motivated workforce, including employees who want to learn and grow within an organization? If not which areas need improvement or better motivation.**  - Yes  	- No    with sections of:     o Lack enthusiasm.     o Not enough passion for the job
**Do you feel that your company's training programs are effective in creating a diverse workforce, including employees from all background and cultures? If not which areas need improvement or better inclusion.**  - Yes  	- No    with sections of:     o Lack representation.     o Not enough acceptance

This JSON object represents a questionnaire with the code 'TechEmployeeEngagement' and name 'Tech Employee Engagement Questionnaire'. The questionnaire has two questions, each with a unique code, content, type, display order, and a list of possible answers. The type of the questions is 3, which means it is a rating type question. The two questions are displayed in order and the answers are represented as strings.
-------------------
=================================================================
1-SHOT
With only the questionnaire TOPIC
=================================================================

-------------------
[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100062
     - Topic: Workplace Culture
     - Question number: 8

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100003
     - Topic: Access to Technology and Tools
     - Question number: 10
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Access to Technology and Tools

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **How would you rate your accessibility, availability of technology tools for work in the company? (1 being very poor; 5 is neutral)**	- Strongly agree - Somewhat disagree   3. [LLM ANSWER] -> JSON 
 {
"data": {
"TF\_QUESTIONNAIRES": [
{
"CODE": "CAREER\_PATH\_CLARITY",
"NAME": "Career Path Clarity Questionnaire",
"TYPE\_ID": 3,
"\_TF\_QUESTIONS": [
{
"CODE": "Q0001",
"NAME": "How clear are you about your career path?",
"TYPE\_ID": 1,
"DISPLAY\_ORDER": 1,
"\_TF\_ANSWERS": [
{
"ANSWER": "1 - Not at all clear about my future job or industry; it's hard finding direction that feels right"
},
{
"ANSWER": "2 - Somewhat uncertain but open new opportunities or roles if they align with interests and goals in the future, however not sure of exactly what I want to do"
},
{
"ANSWER": "3 - Clearer about my future with good ideas on next steps and roles, but still need time/experience to be extremely clear"
},
{
"ANSWER": "4 - Extremely clear; I know exactly what job position wants and it takes me there, no room adjustment based on experience & opportunities available"
},
{
"ANSWER": "5 - Somewhat certain, but need more time experience to fully understand whether the current role is aligned towards a desired career path"
},
{
"ANSWER": "6 - Extremely unlikely - No chance of feeling clear about future job position from this opportunity; I need to find something new in order for them be satisfied with their work and know what exactly wants"
}
]
},
{
"CODE": "Q0002",
"NAME": "Do you feel that your current role is aligned towards a desired career path?",
"TYPE\_ID": 2,
"DISPLAY\_ORDER": 2,
"\_TF\_ANSWERS": [
{
"ANSWER": "1 - Yes"
},
{
"ANSWER": "2 - No"
},
{
"ANSWER": "3 - Somewhat"
}
]
}
]
}
}

This JSON object contains a single property "data" which is also an object. The "data" object contains a single property "TF\_QUESTIONNAIRES" which is an array of two questionnaires. Each questionnaire has a "CODE", "NAME", "TYPE\_ID", "DISPLAY\_ORDER" and "_TF\_QUESTIONS" array. The "_TF\_QUESTIONS" array is an array of questions and each question has a "CODE", "NAME", "TYPE\_ID" and "_TF\_ANSWERS" array. The "_TF\_ANSWERS" array is an array of possible answers to the question and each answer has a "ANSWER" property.

The first questionnaire is for Career Path Clarity and the second questionnaire is for checking whether the current role is aligned towards a desired career path.

This JSON object represents a questionnaire with five questions. The first three questions are of type "True or False" and the last two questions are of type "True or False" with no predefined answers. The fourth question is a text question and the fifth question is a Likert scale question with two possible answers "Positive" and "Negative".

Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement.

[LLM ANSWER]
 **What is the primary feedback mechanism used in your team at work: (Select one)** * Formal written communication from supervisor to employee.  	* One-on–one meeting with manager or direct report  o Group meetings and discussions where everyone has a chance for input, but no set agenda beforehand
> - Other method not listed here? Please specify!<br><hr id="raw" style="" class"" /> **How often do you receive feedback at work: (Select one)** * Less than once per year  	* At least twice in the same period of time as your performance review.  o More frequently, but with no formal structure or schedule
> - Other method not listed here? Please specify!<br><hr id="raw" style="" class"" /> **Do you feel that feedback is often presented to address specific concerns and areas for improvement: (Select one)** * Yes  	* No  o Not sure. I find it difficult sometimes if the focus of a conversation
> - Other option not listed here? Please specify!<br><hr id="raw" style="" class"" /> **Do you feel that feedback is presented in an actionable format: (Select one)** * Yes  	* No  o Not sure. I think there are times when the information could be more specific
> - Other option not listed here? Please specify!<br><hr id="raw" style="" class"" /> **Do you feel that feedback is presented in a way which allows for reflection and growth: (Select one)** * Yes  	* No  o Not sure. I believe there are times when the information could be more reflective
> - Other option not listed here? Please specify!<br><hr id="raw" style="" class"" /> **Do you feel that feedback is presented in a way which allows for dialogue and discussion: (Select one)** * Yes  	* No  o Not sure. I think there are times when the information could be more open to conversation

> - Other option not listed here? Please specify!<br><hr id="raw" style="" class"" /> **Do you feel that feedback is presented in a way which allows for growth and development: (Select one)** * Yes  	* No  o Not sure. I think there are times when the information could be more constructive

1-SHOT
With only the questionnaire TOPIC
=================================================================

-------------------
[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100005
     - Topic: Access to Technology and Tools
     - Question number: 11

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100018
     - Topic: Feedback Mechanisms
     - Question number: 9
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Feedback Mechanisms

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **Do you have an understanding of your current performance level based upon the company's standards for success in this role ? (Yes, No)** If no please elaborate. 10 point scale: >5 means yes and <4 Means NO! Please provide some details about what is not working
**How often do I give you feedback? Do my comments help your progression towards the company goals?(Always/Sometimes /Never ) (If Never, why?) If Yes please elaborate how it helps.**"Feedback frequency: Always=10 points; Sometimes =6 Points and never 5 Point."
**Do we have a formal process for providing feedback? And if yes do you feel that is enough or more frequent communication would be better?(Yes/No) (If no, why not?) If Yes please elaborate how it should look.**"Formal Feedback Process: Existence of the company goals and roadmap = 10 points; Partial existence but need to work on details=6 Points ; No process at all -5 Point."
**Do you feel that my feedback is clear, concise & actionable? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Clarity of the Feedback: Clear and Consice =10 points; Somewhat unclear=6 Points ; Not at all 5 Point."
**Do you think that my feedback is given in a timely manner or I am too late? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Timeliness of the Feedback: Timeline for providing =10 points; Delay more than one week=6 Points ; Too long 5 Point."
**Do you think that my feedback is constructive and has a positive tone? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Positivity of the Feedback: Positive & Constructiv =10 points; Somewhat unclear=6 Points ; Not at all 5 Point."
**Do you think that my feedback is consistent and not varying too much? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Consistency of the Feedback: Consistent & Uniform =10 points; Somewhat unclear=6 Points ; Not at all 5 Point."
**Do you think that I am providing feedback on a regular basis? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Regularity of the Feedback: Regularly provided and consistent =10 points; Somewhat unclear=6 Points ; Not at all 5 Point."
**Do you think that I am providing enough feedback to help your success? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Adequacy of the Feedback: Able and sufficient =10 points; Somewhat unclear=6 Points ; Not at all 5 Point."
**Do you think that I am providing feedback on a wide range topics? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Variety in terms of Topics : Wide ranging and diverse =10 points; Somewhat unclear=6 Points ; Not at all 5 Point."
**Do you think that I am providing feedback on a regular basis to help your success? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Regularity of the Feedback: Regularly provided and consistent =10 points; Somewhat unclear=6 Points ; Not at all 5 Point."
**Do you think that I am providing feedback on a wide range topics to help your success? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Variety in terms of Topics : Wide ranging and diverse =10 points; Somewhat unclear=6 Points ; Not at all 5 Point."
**Do you think that my feedback is constructive enough to help your success? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Constructivity in the Feedback: Constructively and positive =10 points; Somewhat unclear=6 Points ; Not at all 5 Point."
**Do you feel that my feedback is given with a good balance between constructive criticism & compliments? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Balance in the Feedback: Balanced =10 points; Somewhat unclear=6 Points ; Not at all 5 Point."
**Do you think that I am providing feedback to help your success and progression towards company goals? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Helpfulness of the Feedback: Helpful =10 points; Somewhat unclear=6 Points ; Not at all 5 Point."
**Do you think that I am providing feedback in a way to help your success and progression towards company goals? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Helpfulness of the Feedback: Helpful =10 points; Somewhat unclear=6 Points ; Not at all 5 Point."
**Do you feel that my feedback is given in a way to help your success and progression towards company goals? (Yes/No) If no please elaborate how it could be improved.**"Helpfulness of the Feedback: Helpful =10 points; Somewhat unclear=6 Points ; Not at all 5 Point."

[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100038
     - Topic: Quality of Diversity Training Programs
     - Question number: 7

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100019
     - Topic: Health and Safety Measures
     - Question number: 7
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User:

-------------------

 "data": {
 "TF_QUESTIONNAIRES": [

 "_TF_QUESTIONS": [

 "NAME": "Which department within the company is responsible for ensuring health and safety measures are implemented properly?",
 "TYPE_ID": 1,
 "DISPLAY_ORDER": 1,
 "_TF_ANSWERS": [
 {
 "ANSWER": "Human Resources"
 }
 ]
 },
 {
 "CODE": "OT_HEALTH_SAFETY_MEASURES",
 "NAME": "Rate the importance of the following health and safety measures on a scale of 1 to 10, with 1 being not important at all and 10 being very critical.",
 "TYPE_ID": 3,
 "DISPLAY_ORDER": 2,
 "_TF_ANSWERS": [
 {
 "ANSWER": "Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)",
 "ANSWER_CODE": "PPE"
 },
 {
 "ANSWER": "Handwashing",
 "ANSWER_CODE": "HANDWASHING"
 },
 {
 "ANSWER": "Social Distancing",
 "ANSWER_CODE": "SOCIAL_DISTANCING"
 },
 {
 "ANSWER": "Temperature Checks",
 "ANSWER_CODE": "TEMPERATURE_CHECKS"
 },
 {
 "ANSWER": "Health Screening",
 "ANSWER_CODE": "HEALTH_SCREENING"
 },
 {
 "ANSWER": "Respiratory Etiquette",
 "ANSWER_CODE": "RESPIRATORY_ETIQUETTE"
 },
 {
 "ANSWER": "Workplace Cleaning",
 "ANSWER_CODE": "WORKPLACE_CLEANING"
 },
 {
 "ANSWER": "Ventilation",
 "ANSWER_CODE": "VENTILATION"
 },
 {
 "ANSWER": "Occupancy Limits",
 "ANSWER_CODE": "OCCUPANCY_LIMITS"
 },
 {
 "ANSWER": "Communication Plan",
 "ANSWER_CODE": "COMMUNICATION_PLAN"
 }
 ]
 }
 ]
 }
 }
}

This JSON represents a questionnaire with a single question. The question is asking which department within the company is responsible for implementing health and safety measures, and the answer is "Human Resources". The question also has a single possible answer, "Human Resources", with a code of "HR".

The second question in the JSON is asking to rate the importance of several health and safety measures on a scale of 1 to 10. The question has 10 possible answers, each represented by a code, and the answers are "Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)", "Handwashing", "Social Distancing", "Temperature Checks", "Health Screening", "Respiratory Etiquette", "Workplace Cleaning", "Ventilation", "Occupancy Limits", and "Communication Plan". The answers are displayed in a specific order, with "Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)" having a code of "PPE" and "Handwashing" having a code of "HANDWASHING", and so on.

[LLM ANSWER]
 **Do the current health, safety measures in your company meet regulatory standards or not?(Yes /No)** <br> If yes: Great! We should still make sure that everyone is aware of them. Continue to next questions.<BR><BREAK/>If no; Which regulations are being violated and how can we improve?<Br
What specific health, safety measures does your company have in place?(Multiple Choice)  <br>- Use PPE (Personal Protective Equipment), if yes which ones do you use ?  	1. Respirators/Face masks   2 . Gloves    3.. Safety Goggles     4 Other(please specify)</BREAK><BR/>
<Br />Does your company provide necessary training and education about the health, safety measures?(Yes /No) If yes; Is this information accessible to everyone? (Multiple Choice):  <br>- Through Intranet/Website  	1. Classroom Training Sessions   2 . Online Learning Platforms    3 Other(please specify);<Br/>

The first question is a rating question asking how familiar the respondent is with internal mobility opportunities, and the remaining questions are yes/no questions. Employee referral program c) Social media d.) Intranet of the company   e ) Other - Please Specify: _______________ ​​1. Did you apply for any internal job posting in past year and how many times?
    (max 2 options). a ). Yes, once or more than one time b . No c) Not applicable / not sure yet but would like to know the opportunities   d ) Other - Please Specify: _______________ ​​1. Did you get this job that applied for and how long did it take?

This JSON object represents a questionnaire with four questions. The first question asks whether the respondent is aware of internal opportunities, the second question is about the source of information, the third question is about applying for a job, and the fourth question is about the general perception of internal mobility programs. Each question has a unique code, name, type, display order, and a list of possible answers. The type of the question is specified with the `TYPE_ID` property. For example, if the `TYPE_ID` is 1, it means that the question is a single-choice question. If `TYPE_ID` is 3, it means that the question is a rating question. The `DISPLAY_ORDER` property specifies the order in which questions should be displayed. The `\_TF_ANSWERS` array contains a list of possible answers, and the `ANSWER` property specifies the content of the answer.
-------------------

1-SHOT
With only the questionnaire TOPIC
=================================================================

Generate me a questionnaire on Internal Mobility Opportunities

[LLM ANSWER]
 **Have you been informed about internal mobility opportunities within your current company in past year by HR department, manager etc. ? If yes then how many times this information has shared with You.** (Yes / No) and if Yes(1-5 no of time it was communicated to employee). Please also mention the medium like email or verbal communication
**Do you think that internal mobility opportunities are well publicized within your company? Can be answered on a scale from 0 - not at all, through five (completely)**. Also state reason behind this answer if below four and suggest how to improve it for better awareness among employees about these programs in organization ?
**Do you think there is enough internal mobility opportunities available as per your interest level or expectation? Can be answered on a scale from 0 - not at all, through five (completely)**. If no then what would make those resources more accessible to meet the needs of individual employees and address their career growth ?
**Do you feel that there are any barriers in place preventing internal mobility within your company like lack or irregularity on training programs? Can be answered yes/no.** Also state reason behind this answer if Yes. Suggest how these can removed from pathway to make it more accessible for employees and help them grow with organization ?
**Do you feel that the current process of filling internal mobility positions is fair, transparent enough so all eligible candidates have equal chance? Can be answered yes/no.** Also state reason behind this answer if Yes. Suggest how can transparency in selection procedure increased to make it more accessible for employees and promote a culture where everyone has an opportunity ?
**Have you ever been discouraged by someone from applying internal mobility opportunities within your company, or have You heard others being told not apply because of their current role? Can be answered yes/no.** Also state reason behind this answer if Yes. Suggest how to overcome these barriers and make it more accessible for employees ?
**Do you feel that there is enough support from HR department in terms providing information about internal mobility opportunities, helping with the transition into new roles etc., or do You think something could be done better? Can been answered on a scale of 0 - not at all to five (completely)**. If no then what would make those resources more accessible and help you feel supported within organization ?
**Do internal mobility opportunities match your career goals, aspirations in terms as per role requirement or any other factor like location? Can be answered on a scale from 0 - not at all to five (completely)**. If no then what would make those resources more accessible and help you feel that they are aligned with the needs of individual employees ?
**Do internal mobility opportunities offer diverse range in terms as per your interest level or expectation? Can be answered on a scale from 0 - not at all to five (completely)**. If no then what would make those resources more accessible and help you feel that they are aligned with the needs of individual employees ?
**Do internal mobility opportunities within company provide opportunity for professional growth, development as per your expectation? Can be answered on a scale from 0 - not at all to five (completely)**. If no then what would make those resources more accessible and help you feel that they are aligned with the needs of individual employees ?
**Have internal mobility opportunities within company been used by You or any other employee as stepping stone for further career growth? Can be answered yes/no.** Also state reason behind this answer if Yes. Suggest how to create these kind opportunity more accessible and help you feel that they are aligned with the needs of individual employees ?
**Do internal mobility opportunities within company provide enough information about available positions, requirements etc., or do You think something could been done better? Can be answered on a scale from 0 - not at all through five (completely)**. If no then what would make those resources more accessible and help you feel that they are aligned with the needs of individual employees ?
**Do internal mobility opportunities within company provide enough information about available positions, requirements etc., or do You think something could been done better? Can be answered on a scale from 0 - not at all through five (completely)**. If no then what would make those resources more accessible and help you feel that they are aligned with the needs of individual employees ?
**Do internal mobility opportunities within company provide enough information about available positions, requirements etc., or do You think something could been done better? Can be answered on a scale from 0 - not at all through five (completely)**. If no then what would make those resources more accessible and help you feel that they are aligned with the needs of individual employees ?

[LLM ANSWER]
 **What is your role in this organization currently (considering only professional roles)? Can you please specify.**  - Executive Director / CEO  	- Senior Manager    ><------------------     <br /> &nbsp;          |        Head of Department         |||||                      %%            
Manager               *&*       Team Leader           ++++++++            Employee             --------------/------------- (-) ( ) (+50%)  - Contractor / Consultant  	- Temporary Worker    ><------------------     <br /> &nbsp;          |        Other, please specify                         |||||            
**How long have you been with the company? Can we know that too :)**      <=1 year              %%            ( ) (+20%)  - More than a month but less then three months   ><------------------     <br /> &nbsp;          |        Less Than Three Months                           |||||            
- Between one and two years         ++++++++   	( /) (-15 % for each year of service )  - More than Two Years, but less then five      ><------------------     <br /> &nbsp;          |        Less Than Five But Greater Then Three              |||||

     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Leadership Effectiveness

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **How would you describe leadership effectiveness in an organization setting to someone who doesn't work here yet: (Please select all that apply)** 	- A leader with excellent communication skills and empathy for the team.  	    - An inspiring figurehead, able of motivate employees towards a common goal
            > Someone whose actions aligns to vision/mission statement in every decision they make (Please select all that apply)  \*\*Do you think there is enough support and resources for the leaders within this organization?\***  	- Yes, definitely! We have everything we need.   
            > More or less but it's sufficient to achieve goals set out by company (Please select all that apply)  \*\*Have you had a chance of working with someone who could be considered an effective leader?\***  	- Yes, many times! I can name specific people.   
            > No but their leadership style is evident in the way they manage projects and teams (Please select all that apply)  \*\*Do you think there are enough training opportunities for leaders to improve themselves?\***  	- Yes, our company offers a lot of development programs.

How would YOU rate this aspect of OnBoarding experience?<br /><strong style="font size:2">Do you feel that onboarding process was a good start for your career ?**
- Yes, I felt it set me up well (5) or no not really (-4)</p>&#x; **Question 1:** *An employee who feels* <u
     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Onboarding Experience

-------------------
[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100016
     - Topic: Feedback Mechanisms
     - Question number: 5

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100035
     - Topic: Onboarding Experience
     - Question number: 6
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Onboarding Experience

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **What is your role within the company and who do new employees report to during their first week of work (if applicable)? Please specify:**  - Executive / Senior Management   <br>   	- Manager<Br/>            &nbsp;       -----------      </p><div style="background: #fff0f5 url(http://placehold.it/16x9&text=+) no
repeat left top;" class='formy'>         - Staff / Employee   <br>   	- Intern<Br/>            &nbsp;       -----------      </p><div style="background: #fff0f5 url(http://placehold.it/16x9&text=+) no repeat left top;" class='formy'>         - Other (please specify): ________________<Br/>            &nbsp;       -----------      </p>
  <br><div style="background: #fff0f5 url(http://placehold.it/16x9&text=+) no repeat left top;" class='formy'>    **Have you ever been a new employee at this company?**   - Yes<Br/>            &nbsp;       -----------      </p>
  <br><div style="background: #fff0f5 url(http://placehold.it/16x9&text=+) no repeat left top;" class='formy'>    **If you have ever been a new employee, what was your first impression of the onboarding process?**   - Very positive<Br/>            &nbsp;       -----------      </p>
  <br><div style="background: #fff0f5 url(http://placehold.it/16x9&text=+) no repeat left top;" class='formy'>    **If you have ever been a new employee, which part of the onboarding process was most memorable?**   - Orientation<Br/>            &nbsp;       -----------      </p>
  <br><div style="background: #fff0f5 url(http://placehold.it/16x9&text=+) no repeat left top;" class='formy'>    **Do you think the onboarding process is important for new employees?**   - Yes, extremely<Br/>            &nbsp;       -----------      </p>
  <br><div style="background: #fff0f5 url(http://placehold.it/16x9&text=+) no repeat left top;" class='formy'>    **If you have ever been a new employee, did the onboarding process help ease your transition into this company?**   - Yes<Br/>            &nbsp;       -----------      </p>
  <br><div style="background: #fff0f5 url(http://placehold.it/16x9&text=+) no repeat left top;" class='formy'>    **Do you think the onboarding process is long enough to cover all necessary information and tasks?**   - Yes<Br/>            &nbsp;       -----------      </p>

**Do You feel pressure at work? **: Yes/No, please give a number from scale of one (lowest level ) 1-2;    3 ;  4   5(highest) - Please specify if you are not able or willing because it is against your beliefs. If yes ,please answer the next question
**On average how many days do You feel pressure to work in a week?**:     0/7  (never),      1-2;    3 ;   4+   .Please give more details if you are giving an exact number, e..g How often and why. If it is not possible for some reason please specify
**Do your supervisors or team leaders apply pressure on You to perform?**: Yes/No - Please explain in detail who applies the most , how they do this (e-mail / phone calls  etc)and what you feel about that, if any. If yes could be more specific with a number from scale of one(lowest level )  1;    2 ;   3+
**Do You believe pressure is always bad?**: Yes/No - Please explain why or give an example in detail ,if it might not seem so to you .Please also mention if there are any positive aspects  about this.If yes could be more specific with a number from scale of one(lowest level )  1;    2 ;   3+

     - Topic: Quality of Diversity Training Programs
     - Question number: 7
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Quality of Diversity Training Programs

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **What is your role within this organization: Executive, Manager (please specify level), Staff member.** \_\_ \_​ 1. Other _(specify)_ ​230\*\* Category**How long have you been with the company? Less than a year / More or less between one and three years/More
than five consecutive employment anniversaries in this organization (please specify)** **Do your responsibilities include managing diversity training programs for employees within our organisation: Yes _​ 326\*\* Category**How many times have you attended any kind of D&I or other workplace culture related trainings?
Less than three / More then five/More, but less six (please specify)** **On a scale from one to ten how would rate the quality and usefulness for yourself personally: 1 _​**Category |2|3 Category[-------------------] How many times have you attended diversity training programs organised by your company? It has 7 questions, each with a unique code, content, type, display order, and a set of possible answers. Questions are displayed in the following order:

2. How well do diversity training programs fit the company culture?
3. How satisfied are you with the diversity training programs?

5. Do you think that diversity training programs are a good use of company resources?
6. Are diversity training programs easily understood and accessible to all employees?
7. Are diversity training programs tailored to meet the needs of different employee groups?

User 32: I don’t see any questions to answer but will respond in the form of sharing information about employee wellbeing programs and activities that an organization can implement, including some related specifically with mental health. These are just suggestions not based on specific scenarios or situations so you may need/want adjust them for a better fit depending which company is being referred:
1) Establishing Employee Wellness Programs - This could include things like providing healthy food options in cafeterias, organizing wellbeing fairs and workshops that teach skills such as stress management techniques. It’ll be important to consider what employees actually want rather than assuming they will enjoy certain activities or initiatives just because the company thinks it'd benefit them; this way participation can feel more voluntary too!
2) Encouraging Work-Life Balance - Organizations should encourage taking time off and unplugging from work even when not mandatory. This might be through policies like minimum vacation lengths, communicating about benefits of downtime or sharing stories/information around how people spend their free hours away helping normalize the concept for everyone else too!
3) Implementing Mental Health Programs - Organizations can provide resources and support systems specifically designed to help employees maintain positive mental health. This could include onsite therapy sessions, online self-guided courses about common issues faced at work (like anxiety), or simply providing information around local therapists/psychologists who specialize in workplace concerns so it's easier for individuals seeking professional guidance if needed
4) Creating a Supportive Environment - It is crucial to make sure all employees feel comfortable sharing ideas, opinions and even criticisms without fear of negative consequences. This means not only establishing an open communication policy but also ensuring managers are trained on how best lead teams using positive reinforcement while still maintaining authority when necessary; this way people will naturally want support each other instead feeling like they have to because someone else told them too!
5) Providing Accessibility Resources - Considering access for all abilities is essential. This means providing accommodations such as screen readers, captioned videos or simply making sure website and documents are easy-to read even without special adjustments needed by people who struggle with regular text due physical limitations etc . The goal here should be ensuring every employee has equal opportunity regardless of ability level
6) Fostering Community Engagement - Organizations can support local communities through various means, including volunteer programs or sponsoring events. By engaging in community activities beyond just business transactions it allows employees to feel good about where they work and what their employer stands for; this sense belongingness helps boost morale overall too!
7) Offer Professional Development Opportunities - Continual growth is key both professionally but also personally, so offering chances at learning new skills or advancing knowledge through workshops/conferences etc will help keep employees satisfied in the long term. Plus such events can serve as networking opportunity where people might find future collaborators too!
8) Conducting Stay Interviews - To ensure teams stay motivated and committed over time employers should consider having regular 'stay interviews' – short conversations asking if individuals still feel happy working there, what could be improved further etc. That way any issues identified early on can addressed before becoming bigger problems down line negatively impact overall satisfaction rates or even causing people leave altogether
9) Collecting and Actively Using Employee Feedback - Listening to employee opinions is crucial for a successful organization; this means not only conducting surveys but also making sure results are acted upon. If changes suggested by many yet ignored, then survey becomes pointless exercise rather than valuable tool driving progress towards better workplace environment
10) Prioritizing Health and Safety Measures – Keeping everyone safe at work must always come first! This includes providing protective equipment where needed/appropriate but also ensuring regular training around safety protocols. By keeping this topic high on agenda, organizations can show they care about their employees beyond just productivity numbers which helps build trust long term too
These are ten suggestions for improving employee wellbeing and mental health in the workplace; again these may need adjusted depending specific company context so should review carefully before implementation begins!

You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement.

[LLM ANSWER]
**How satisfied are you with the current roadplan? (from your team or company)**  1 – Not at all, to be avoided;   2-3: Needs significant improvement and attention before implementation. 4 -5 : Good but can still improve in certain areas for better results!
6+ Better than expected so we should keep it as is!!!!! **Please specify what you like about the current roadmap.**  1 – Specific goals with deadlines;   2-3: Clear communication of tasks and responsibilities, including who will be doing which task. 4 -5 : Good collaboration between teams/departments in place for a smooth execution!
6+ The best way to reach our goal as one team!!! **Please specify what you think needs improvement?**  1 – Unclear goals;   2-3: Lack of deadlines or milestones. 4 -5 : Some tasks are not clearly defined and need more clarification before implementation!
6+ The worst way to work with no clear goal in mind!!! **Please specify what you think needs improvement?**  1 – Clear goals but lacks resources;   2-3: Goals overlap between teams, causing confusion. 4 -5 : Good planning for tasks and milestones are just missing some essential details!
6+ The best way to improve is by providing more information about the roadmap or adjusting deadlines so we can reach our targets!!! **Please specify what you think needs improvement?**  1 – Lack of communication;   2-3: Not enough resources for all tasks. 4 -5 : There are no clear instructions on how to proceed, and it is hard not knowing where the team should start from!
6+ The best way would be by providing a detailed plan with everything needed so we can execute without any issues!!! **Please specify what you think needs improvement?**  1 – Lack of flexibility;   2-3: Too rigid in structure, making it difficult to adapt when things don’t go as planned. 4 -5 : Good planning but need more room for changes and adjustments!
6+ The best way would be by providing a flexible plan that can change with the team's needs!!! **Please specify what you think should stay in current roadmap?**  1 – Clear objectives;   2-3: Defined tasks, milestones & deadlines. 4 -5 : Good communication and collaboration between teams/departments!
6+ The best way is to keep the clear objective with defined steps so we can reach our target without any issues!!! **Please specify what you think should change in current roadmap?**  1 – Lack of resources;   2-3: Not enough time or people for all tasks. 4 -5 : Good planning but need more information and details on how to proceed!
6+ The best way would be by providing a detailed plan with everything needed so we can execute without any issues!!! **Please specify what you think should change in current roadmap?**  1 – Lack of flexibility;   2-3: Too rigid structure, making it difficult for the team or department to adapt when things don’t go as planned. 4 -5 : Good planning but need more room and space so we can adjust if needed!!!
6+ The best way would be by providing a flexible plan that allows us all teams/departments work together smoothly without any issues in reaching our target! **Do you think there is enough time for the team to prepare?**  1 – Yes, no problem at this point;   2-3: Enough but with some difficulties. 4 -5 : Need more than one month preparation period!!!
6+ The best way would be by providing a long and detailed planning process that gives everyone involved enough time for the team to prepare! **Do you think there is too much or little information in current roadmap?**  1 – Too many details;   2-3: Just right, not more nor less. 4 -5 : More detail needed so we can execute without any issues!!!
6+ The best way would be by providing a detailed plan with everything that the team needs to make sure everyone is on board and knows what they need! **Do you think there are enough resources for current roadmap?**  1 – No, not at all. 2-3: Enough but just barely;   4 -5 : Yes definitely!!!
6+ The best way would be by providing a detailed plan with everything needed so we can execute without any issues and reach our target! **Do you think the current roadmap is realistic?**  1 – No, not at all. 2-3: Somewhat unrealistic;   4 -5 : Yes definitely!!!

Generate me a questionnaire on Training and Development Programs

[LLM ANSWER]
 **Have you ever participated any training program at your current job position within the last year (excluding orientation)? If yes, how many programs have been attended by yourself in this time frame:** 	Yes / No. Please specify number of trainings if Yes is selected for a person or Zero otherwise
```vbnet linenums=1|20-35:8;format="plain" The company has provided training to you on specific topics, how would rate the quality and usefulness in your current role? 	Unsatisfactory / Somewhat Sat. (Quality) | Fairly Good or Excellent
```In last one year have been offered any opportunity for skill development that includes technical skills by company where are currently employed ? If yes then please specify number of such opportunities and also rate the quality on scale from 1 to be very poor,2 as Poor ,3 Average/Normal upto5 Very Good. Please enter your answer in (Technical Skills)
```python linenums=4;format="plain" In last one year have been offered any opportunity for skill development that includes soft skills by company where are currently employed ? If yes then please specify number of such opportunities and also rate the quality on scale from 1 to be very poor,2 as Poor ,3 Average/Normal upto5 Very Good. Please enter your answer in (Soft Skills)
```How often do you prefer that trainings should take place for better understanding?**	Monthly / Quarter-wise or Bi Monthy(Every two months)/ Half Year Basis and also please specify the preferred method of learning like Online/Classroom training. Please enter your answer in (Training Preference)
```python linenums=1;format="plain" Do you think that company should spend more on providing trainings to employees? If yes, then do mention what kind or type for which department it would be useful and also specify whether they are mandatory/compulsory as per your job profile. Please enter in (Training Investment)
```python linenums=1;format="plain" What is the main obstacle that comes into way of participating training provided by company?**	Lack Of Time / Lacks Resources or Infrastructure and also please specify whether it can be resolved with a better planning. Please enter your answer in (Training Participation)
```python linenums=1;format="plain" How do you rate the effectiveness of current training programs provided by company?**	Unsatisfactory / Somewhat Sat.(Effectiveness Of Training Programs Currently Being Used By Company).Please Enter Your Answer In The Following Format: (Training Effective or Not)
```python linenums=1;format="plain" Do you think your current job role demands more skill sets to be accomplished? If yes, then please specify how many and also rate the importance of those skills on scale from 0-5. Please enter in Number Of Skills Required And Importance On Scale From Zero To Five
```python linenums=1;format="plain" Do you prefer that these skill development opportunities should be provided to only certain employees or all based upon their job profile? If yes, then please specify how many and also rate the importance of those skills on scale from 0-5. Please enter in Number Of Skills Required And Importance On Scale From Zero To Five
```python linenums=1;format="plain" Do you think that company should spend more time for developing its employees? If yes, then do mention what kind or type of training it would be useful and also specify whether they are mandatory/compulsory as per your job profile. Please enter in (Training Investment)
```python linenums=1;format="plain" How often does the company provide opportunities for skill development to its employees?**	Monthly / Quarter-wise or Bi Monthy(Every two months)/ Half Year Basis and also please specify whether they are mandatory/compulsory as per your job profile. Please enter in (Training Frequency)
```python linenums=1;format="plain" How do you rate the training programs provided by company?**	Unsatisfactory / Somewhat Sat.(Quality Of Training Programs Currently Being Used By Company).Please Enter Your Answer In The Following Format:(Program Quality or Not )

Generate me a questionnaire on Training and Development Programs

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **How would rate the current training programs offered by our company in terms of relevance, accessibility or quality for your role within this organization (1 being poor to5being excellent)?** Please specify. 	- Poor: Not at all relevant / accessible etc - Excellent : Very useful and easy accesible
========================= Applicability =============== Is the training program related directly with what you do in a way that it could be considered as an essential tool for your work? (1 being not applicable to 5being fully applicabile)	- Not at all: I cannot use this even if i wanted - Fully appliable
========================= Content =============== Is the content of training programs appropriate and relevant in terms on increasing knowledge, skills or competences related with you role within our company? (1 being not appropiate to 5being fully relevent)	- Not at all: The topics are outdated - Fully Releveant
========================= Effectiveness =============== Do the training programs have a positive impact on your performance in terms of quality and efficiency, or do you feel that other methods should be used? (1 being not effective to 5being fully)	- Not at all: I didnt see any improvement - Fully effectiveness
========================= Accessibility =============== Is the training programs easily accessible for every employee within our company in terms of time and resources, or do you feel that other methods should be used? (1 being not accesible to 5being fully)	- Not at all: I cant access it even if i wanted - Fully Accessibility
========================= Personalization =============== Do the training programs consider your personal learning style in terms of pace, format and content or do you feel that they are too general? (1 being not customized to 5being fully)	- Not at all: They dont care about my way - Fully Customised
========================= Assessment =============== Have the training programs been evaluated after completion for their effectiveness in terms of learning, skills and competences gained by you or other employees? (1 being not assessed to 5being fully)	- Not at all: I dont know if it was effective - Fully assessment
========================= Sustainability =============== Do the training programs have a long term vision for our company in terms of sustainabilty and growth, do you consider that they can be an investment? (1 being not sustainable to 5being fully)	- Not at all: I dont see how it could help - Fully sutainability
========================= Personal development =============== Do the training programs support your personal professional developement in terms of career growth, or do you feel that they are too focused on a specific task? (1 being not supporting to 5being fully)	- Not at all: It doesnt help me - Fully supportive
========================= Feedback =============== Have any feedback been given about the training programs in terms of what worked and didnot work, or is this process missing from our company culture? (1 being not present to 5being fully)	- Not at all: I dont know if it was good - Fully presence
========================= Technology =============== Do you think that technology plays a role on the training programs in terms of accessibility and content, or do they seem outdated for your needs? (1 being not technological to 5being fully)	- Not at all: I dont like how it is - Fully Technological
========================= Preference =============== Do you prefer online classes rather than classroom training programs in terms of learning experience and content, or do they seem the same for your needs? (1 being not preferred to 5being fully)	- Not at all: I dont like how it is - Fully preference

The second question asks about applicability with options including "Not at all", "Somewhat", "Mostly", and "Always". Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.

[LLM ANSWER]
 **How would rate your overall work-life balance in terms that are important to YOU (not just what is considered "normal") from 1 - not at all balanced, through the ideal score of '5', and upwards?**  	Including a comment box for each question will allow participants an opportunity give more context.
```diff!- Not At All Balanced:   0     -------------------|       |-------+----- (Strongly Disagree) 1 - Slight Unbalancd :    2 --->   <------||---------(Moderately Agrees/Disgarees)|       3 – Neutral                        4 --- Majority of time is balanced:   5 -->     -------------------|       |-------+----- (Strongly agree)
```**Do you feel that your employer respects the boundaries and limits set around work hours? ```diff!-------------------|       |-------+----- (Strongly Disagree) 0 --->    <------||---------(Moderately Agrees/Disgarees)|       1                              2 --- Majoriy of time is balanced:  3 -->     ------------>    -------------        4 ----- Yes, always            5-->-------------------|       |-------+----- (Strongly agree)

Generate me a questionnaire on WorkLife Balance

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **Do you feel like your work schedule allows sufficient time to maintain personal responsibilities outside of the workplace, such as taking care of family and engaging in hobbies?(Yes / No)** 	- Yes -No   (Please select one)    If no: What are some challenges that prevent this balance?
------------------If yes then ask--------------- Are there any policies or initiatives you would like to see implemented by the company regarding work life Balance ?(Multiple Choice, Select all options possible ) * Flexible working hours 	- Working from home / Remote Work   - Part time employees with no negative connotation/stigma associated
------------------If yes then ask--------------- On a scale of one (1) to ten how would you rate your current work life balance? If not satisfied, why and what could be improved ?(Multiple Choice , Select all options possible ) * Personal Time 	- Family time / Social Life   - Health & Fitness
------------------If yes then ask--------------- Do the company's policies regarding sick leave or vacation days allow enough flexibility to take care of personal responsibilities? (Yes/No) If no, what could be improved ?(Multiple Choice , Select all options possible ) * Clear communication on time off procedures 	- Personalized schedule for taking breaks and vacations
------------------If yes then ask--------------- Does the company provide any resources or tools to help you manage your work life balance? (Yes/No) If no, what could be provided ?(Multiple Choice , Select all options possible ) * Childcare support / Elderly care 	- Parenting classes and workshops
------------------If yes then ask--------------- Do the company's policies regarding remote or hybrid working help in maintaining work life balance? (Yes/No) If no, what could be improved ?(Multiple Choice , Select all options possible ) * More flexible hours / Better communication on availability 	- Clear guidelines and procedures for taking time off
------------------If yes then ask--------------- On a scale of one to ten how would you rate the company's commitment towards work life balance? If not satisfied, why ?(Multiple Choice , Select all options possible ) * Lack or inadequate communication on policies 	- Inconsistent implementation and enforcement

This JSON object represents a questionnaire about work-life balance. The questionnaire has three questions, each with a unique code, name, and display order. The first and third questions allow the respondent to choose one answer from a list of two options, while the second question is a rating question with a scale of 1 to 10. The fourth question allows the respondent to choose multiple options from a list of five possible resources or tools. The answer type for each question is also specified.
-------------------
=================================================================
1-SHOT
With only the questionnaire TOPIC
=================================================================

-------------------
[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100045
     - Topic: Smart working
     - Question number: 6

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100054
     - Topic: WorkLife Balance
     - Question number: 7
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on WorkLife Balance

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **Do You Feel That Your Job Has Become More Stressful Lately Than It Was Before (Please Select One)?***  Yes, definitely!   Sure has become more stressfull *    No not at all*     Somewhat but it's manageable with some help and support
**How many hours do you work per day on average? ***Less than six******Six to eight****Eight or nine********More then ten***Not Tracking my working Hours. (please select one) **Do You Have Adequate Time To Relax And Recharge Before The Start Of Your Workday,**  Yes I have more time that is enough*    No not at all *   Somewhat but it could be better
     - Sure has become less and need some support from company***How many days of vacation do you take in a year? (Please select one)***- Two or fewer- Three to Five******Five To Seven**********More then seven****I don't track my vacations* **Do You Feel That Work And Personal Life Interfere With Each Other, If Yes Then How Often It Happens In A Week On Average. Please Select One.**  Never interferes with each other *    Sometimes but it is manageable for me***Sure has become a lot and need some support from company*
**Do You Have Any Specific Routines To Maintain Work-Life Balance? If Yes, please specify (Multiple Responses Allowed)**   Meditation or mindfulness exercises ****Physical activity such as sports/exercise classes***Limiting work email after hours******Spending time with friends and family members**None of above
    - Some other routines are: __________________ **Do You Feel That Company Supports Your Work-Life Balance? (Please Select One)***   Yes, definitely! ****Sure has become less but still providing some support *     No not at all***Somewhat But More Can Be Done To Support Me**

"data": {
"TF\_QUESTIONNAIRES": [
{
"CODE": "WORK\_LIFE\_BALANCE",
"NAME": "WorkLifeBalance",
"TYPE\_ID": 3,
"_TF\_QUESTIONS": [
{
"CODE": "WORK\_STRESS",
"NAME": "Do you feel that your job has become more stressful lately than it was before?",
"TYPE\_ID": 1,
"DISPLAY\_ORDER": 1,

1-SHOT
With only the questionnaire TOPIC
=================================================================

-------------------
[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100028
     - Topic: Kick-off Meeting Feedback
     - Question number: 7

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100055
     - Topic: Workload Management
     - Question number: 6
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Workload Management

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]

[LLM ANSWER]
 **Do You Feel Constantly Overloaded With Tasks and Responsibilities at Your Job in the Past Month, Week Etc. ? (Multiple Choice)** 	- Yes - Nope – I have enough time to complete my tasks without feeling stressed or overwhelmed by work responsibilites but not necessarily overworked
– Definitely yes! My Workload is unmanageable and has negatively affected both personal life as well professionally too. Please provide me with some relief options in this questionnaire so i can evaluate them properly – I am on the edge of burnout, constantly feel overwhelmed by work but not necessarily overworked
– Not really; there are times when it feels like a lot is going-on and might be useful to look into how we manage our projects/tasks as team or individually. But at this moment i don’t consider myself Overloaded with tasks – I am able handle my current workload without any problems, but would still appreciate some management techniques for future use
– Yes! And it has been affecting both quality and quantity of output negatively due to Work overloading in past month/week etc. Please suggest me ways i can manage better or share this questionnaire with someone who could help us find solution together 	- No, I am able handle my workload without any problems
**How Often Do You Feel Overloaded With Tasks and Responsibilities at Your Job? (Multiple Choice)** – All the time! It feels like i’m constantly drowning in tasks. Please provide me with some relief options or management techniques so that things become more manageable 	- More than half of my work week, but not all day long
– Sometimes; When there is a lot going on it can be hard to keep up and might need help managing projects/tasks better – Not at All! I feel like i have enough time outside tasks as well so that when things get busy they’re manageable without feeling overwhelmed by work 	- Never, because if this was the case then my job would not exist anymore
**Do you think your current Workload is reasonable and sustainable in long term? (Multiple Choice)** – Yes! I have enough time to complete all tasks with some room left over for unexpected events or emergencies. This work allocation seems perfect 	- Not really, because there are times when it feels like a lot of things happening simultaneously which makes me feel stressed out and unable focus properly on any one thing effectively due unmanageable Workload – I don’t know if my current level is reasonable since i have not had chance evaluate how much time each task should take before being assigned, but would definitely appreciate help in this area 	- Yes! My work allocation seems perfect as long term plan. But sometimes there might be need for some adjustments based on new circumstances or projects coming up
**Do you feel that your Workload is evenly distributed and balanced? (Multiple Choice)** – Absolutely, I think my current tasks are being divided equally among team members including myself 	- Not really; Some of the work items seem unbalanced in terms how much time they take compared to other activities. Please suggest me ways i can balance better
– No! My Workload is not balanced at all because some people get more task than others or certain tasks consume too many resources, making them disproportionate and difficult for everyone involved 	- Yes; I think my work allocation seems perfect as long term plan. But sometimes there might be need to adjust based on new circumstances
**Do you feel that your Workload is affecting the quality of output? (Multiple Choice)** – Nope, not at all! My productivity remains high even when dealing with large number tasks simultaneously 	- Yes; The constant overloading makes me unable focus properly and produce good work. Need help in this area please
– Not sure yet because i have no way measure the impact of my Workload on quality but would like to know more about it – I am not able say for certain whether or how much does affect, as there could be other factors influencing results too

1. Do You Feel Constantly Overloaded With Tasks and Responsibilities at Your Job?
2. How Often Do You Feel Overloaded With Tasks and Responsibilities at Your Job?
3. The constant overloading makes me unable focus properly and produce good work. Need help in this area please

Each question has a list of possible answers, and the type of question is specified as 1, 2, or 3. The first question is a single-choice question, the second question is a multiple-choice question, and the third question is a rating question. The display order of the questions is also specified.

[SAMPLE] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100032
     - Topic: Leadership Effectiveness
     - Question number: 8

-------------------
[TEST] QUESTIONNAIRE_ID: 500100061
     - Topic: Workplace Culture
     - Question number: 6
-------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.
Firstly, the user will ask you to generate a questionnaire specifying the topic.
Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Workplace Culture

-------------------
-------------------
[LLM ANSWER]
 **What is the first thing that comes to mind when you hear 'work culture' term in your company setting, what do people usually understand by this phrase ? (Open-Ended)** 2. How would YOU define workplace or organizational ‘culture’? Please provide a brief definition of no more than two sentences.(Short Answer)
3 . On scale from one to ten how satisfied are you with the current culture in your organization, if zero is completely dissatisfied and Ten fully contented what number will be appropriate for this question?(Rating Scale 0-12 or similar)**. Are there any factors that could improve it? (Multiple Choice).
4 . Is workplace diversity a part of company’s work culture ?(Yes/No) If yes, please elaborate how is your organization implementing and promoting the same.(Short Answer / Long answer with multiple choice options for elaboration)? 5a. To what extent do you feel that there are equal opportunities in place to accommodate everyone irrespective their background or any other factor? (Single Choice Question).
b . If not, please elaborate on why this is NOT happening ?(Long text)6 Do the reward and recognition system at your company reflect its culture?(Yes/No)? How do you feel about it?. Is there a room for improvement in terms of objective criteria or process to make sure everyone gets fair chance? (Multiple Choice).
7 . Are employees encouraged enough through communication, information sharing practice within organization ?(Single choice question with Yes and No options) If no what could be done more specifically from your perspective?(Long text / multiple choices)? 8. Is there a system or program in place that allows you to share constructive feedback about the culture of workplace? (Yes/No).
a . How often do employees get together as team building exercise and discuss different aspects including work environment ?(Single Choice Question) If not, what could be done more specifically from your perspective?(Long text / multiple choices)? 9. Is there a feeling that people in the organization care about each other? (Yes/No).
a . Do you think this is something which can impact organizational performance and success negatively or positively ?(Single choice question) If yes, please elaborate how it could be both positive as well negative.(Long text / multiple choices)? 10. Is there a system in place that allows employees to express their thoughts about the culture of workplace? (Yes/No).
a . Do you think this is something which can impact organizational performance and success negatively or positively ?(Single choice question) If yes, please elaborate how it could be both positive as well negative.(Long text / multiple choices)? 10. Is there a system in place that allows employees to express their thoughts about the culture of workplace? (Yes/No).
a . -------------------
[PROMPTS]
     - System: 
You are a Questionnaire Generator that helps HR users investigate phenomena within the company.

Then, the user will ask to convert it into a specified format.
Be creative and vary the syntax of your questions to enhance user engagement. 

     - User: 
Generate me a questionnaire on Workplace Environment
